data.message:
Why don't care about Syria, Mark Zuckerberg ?!!
aren't they from human begin such as French pepole ?!!
I'm not a fan of "facebook" protesting, but eventually no one knows/cares about Syria from the "outside world", so hopefully this colour is bright enough to grab their attention.
Half a million killed and counting.
Please participate,
Don't be racist Mark !!
#makeFacebookRed
#Aleppo # Syria
#AssadWarCrimes
#AleppoIsBurning
#ﺣﻠﺐ_تحترق
